text.author: Wikinews
text.title: At least 107 killed in Mecca crane collapse
text.summary: On September 12, 2015, at least 107 people were killed and 238 wounded at Mecca's Grand Mosque in Saudi Arabia when a storm caused a construction crane to collapse just ten days before the beginning of the Hajj, Islam's annual pilgrimage to Mecca.
